argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cldcss.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | cldcss.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` W ) |
| 3 |  | cldcss.l | |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | cldcss.c | |- C = ( CSubSp ` W ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_cldcss | |- ( W e. CHil -> ( x e. C <-> ( x e. L /\ x e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elin | |- ( x e. ( L i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) <-> ( x e. L /\ x e. ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( W e. CHil -> ( x e. C <-> x e. ( L i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eqrdv | |- ( W e. CHil -> C = ( L i^i ( Clsd ` J ) ) ) |
